page.title: 11HOUSING FOR OLD PEOPLE
page.content: Many old people in Thornaby live in bungalows,flats, or old peoples homes. The bungalows have only one storey so that the inhabitants don't have to climb stairs. They usually have only one bedroom because the children of the family have married and set up their own homes. Sometimes the gardens round the bungalows are kept tidy by council workers. The flats are in large buildings with many storeys. There are lifts to every floor, but if the lifts are broken some old people can't go out because there are too many stairs to climb. Some old people feel cosy in the flats but others say that they don't have many people to talk to during the day.If some old people can't look after their own home they will live where they can have their own room,but have their meals together.
